title: Collaborative Video Club Exploration Program for Improving Clinical Educators’ Teaching Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Over Three Years of Clinical Education Experience and Possession of Basic Teaching Competencies
context.additional_context: Program for clinical educators in a medical device manufacturer’s in-house training team, focusing on improving instructional competencies through analysis of actual lecture videos

learning_goals: Participants can derive at least three improvement points in their teaching methods through video analysis within six months
Participants can develop two practical instructional strategies applicable to educational settings based on peer feedback
Participants can apply three clinical education theories to real-world cases through collaborative discussion

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
